text: ithin me aluthenma udawena awuruddedi, parana tharaha maraha, konthara, amanapakam,hith nohondakam amathaka karala, koyi kawuruth ekkath samayen samagiyen inna balanawanam hodayi.puluwantharam anith ayage ada kuda hoyanna yanne nathiwa, anunata eershya nokara, thamanta wada ihalin inna kenekwa bimata danna uthsaha nokara, watunu kenekta nagitinna atha dila manussa kame namayen karunawen, maithriyen jiwithe gewanna uthsaha karanna, waradinne na kawadawath.wapurana tharamata aswanna labenawa wage, thamn honda wena tharamata , anungenuth thamanta hondama weyi.

~~~~ manage pintharuwa ~~~~: rokat eke giyapu siripala ape rate hama thanakama - hama kenekma danna deyaki ganja gana puwathaki me - kiyanna yanne hitiya eka manussayek - kolambaata langa honda nagareka siripalaya namin thamayi - ohu handinnuwe puluwan hama welawakama - ganja suruttuwa adima siripalage thibuna - lokuma rajakariyayi me athare loke ape - wenna yanne puduma deyaki nasa eken rokat ekak - yawanna yanne loke inna minisungen - thun denekma thorala rokat eke damimatayi - thiranaya une thundenagen eka minihek - lankaweni thoragaththe wena kawuruth neme ane - siripala thamayi anith denna wena rata wala - nama giya wadakaruwan wethi poth kiyawannek - samagin aacharathumekuyi me athare siripalaya - amarikawe ekka giya ahase inna thibba kale - masa hatharakuyi thamanta uwamana eewa - nasa eken asu nisa ara denna poth - wijja badu buk keruwe siripalaya udata gihin - masa tikak inna nisa athi padamata ganja miti - illa sitiye okkoma badu pak karala - rokat ekath udata yawa me thundena karana wada - nasa eken polowe indan balana unne ekek hondata poth kiyawayi - aneka wijja pennayi siripalaya monawado - hoyanawa penune hoyala hoyala hathi watila - oluwa kasa kasa tikakin andata wati ohe balan - innata wuye melesa masa hathara pura - siduwuye ekama deyaki hathi damamin hoyana ekayi - palaya keruwe masa hathara iwara wela - rokat ekath bimata awith thun denama yahathin - hemihita bahagaththe me kalaya purawatama thaman laba gaththa eewa - nasa eken wimasu wita thun denama menna mehema - pilithuru denne mama nam honda hati kiyawa - sahena pamanata danumak me kalaya purawatama - ras kara gaththa karapu parikshana okkoma - mama hondatama karagaththa nawathama dewal rasakma - mama dana gaththa anthimeta siripalaya - muna norok kara honda hati menna mehema nasa eken - ahanna wuye "koheda ayise ginipettiya - hangala thibbe!!!"

me athara agosthu masa 7 wanida 1953/1954 aya-waya yojana parlimenthuwe wiwadayata gath athara wadi chanda 23 kin dewani wara kiyawa sammatha kara ganini.

dhanaya athath sapa sampath athath wyawahara gnyanaya hina ya.me anuwa mihindu mahimi anu dana wadala dharma sanniwedanaye di pa්radhanama sahithya ha janasha්rathi thora ganima lankiya bauddha sampa්radayata adath thadin ma ka wadi thibe.ehidi wyawahara sinhala bhashawata ha janamathayata ka wadina janakantha ridmayata ‘saddharma rathnawaliya’ tharam sakshiyak merata nathi.aththanayaka em.herath jyeshta kathikacharya peradeniya wishwawidyalayaya
